name: Music Malfunction
description:
Game:

In this game, you play as a music robot. However, the music robot's audio player has malfunctioned, causing the music to get deeper and deeper over time. The deeper the music gets, it will activate enemies from further away, because deeper pitched sounds travel further distances than higher pitched sounds. You can also do a double jump. This game was made for Ludum Dare 48 where the theme was deeper and deeper. I think the game fits the theme because the music gets deeper over time.

Credits:

Programing, art, sound effects: A.J.

Music: Shawn.

The font is arcade classic and made by PizzaDude.

The color palette is Orbee's master palette and made by Orbitron.
